nodes.text: A B2 super battle droid was stationed on the planet of Rugosa in 22 BBY and participated in a Mission to Rugosa.

During the battle, this droid along with the rest of his squad started to fire on three clone troopers, forcing them to seek cover. Later, Jedi Master Yoda arrived and used the Force to lift this droid up and used him to fire upon the rest of his squad. The droid was then destroyed by the remaining battle droids.
